member.name: VOLUME_BITMAP_BUFFER
member.summary: Represents the occupied and available clusters on a disk. This structure is the output buffer for theFSCTL_GET_VOLUME_BITMAP control code.

member.name: VOLUME_BITMAP_BUFFER.StartingLcn
member.summary: Starting LCN requested as an input to the operation.

member.name: VOLUME_BITMAP_BUFFER.BitmapSize
member.summary: The number of clusters on the volume, starting from the starting LCN returned in the StartingLcn member of this structure. See the following Remarks section for details.

member.name: VOLUME_BITMAP_BUFFER.Buffer
member.summary: Array of bytes containing the bitmap that the operation returns. The bitmap is bitwise from bit zero of the bitmap to the end. Thus, starting at the requested cluster, the bitmap goes from bit 0 of byte 0, bit 1 of byte 0 ... bit 7 of byte 0, bit 0 of byte 1, and so on. The value 1 indicates that the cluster is allocated (in use). The value 0 indicates that the cluster is not allocated (free).
